boardgame.name: Archer: Once You Go Blackmail...
boardgame.description: Archer: Once You Go Blackmail... takes the engine at the heart of Love Letter and adds intrigue, vice, and phrasing as well as new card effects._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In short, each player starts the game with one character card in hand; one character is set aside out of play. On a turn, a player draws one card, then plays one of their two cards, carrying out the effect of their character. Try to knock others out of the round or have the highest number in hand when the round ends. Win enough rounds, and you win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 4 - A New Hope (Gen Con Preview)
TGT 108 On Topic: Generic Older Alpha Player Feedback

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ALDERAC ENTERTAINMENT GROUP (AEG5117) Hey, intel doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t gather itself! Your mission: to dig up dirt on Malory Archer and then sell it to the highest bidder. Do you have the wontons to outwit your opponents, get past surly field agents, a loquacious secretary, a mid scientist, and a discordant director of human resources? If you do, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll earn the respect and admiration of your peers ( that was sarcasm ). Archer: Once You Go Blackmail... is a game of risk, deduction, and luck for 2-4 players based on the new award winning Love Letter game engine, with some new twists!

ALDERAC ENTERTAINMENT GROUP (AEG5117) Hey, intel doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t gather itself! Your mission: to dig up dirt on Malory Archer and then sell it to the highest bidder. Archer: Once You Go Blackmail... is a game of risk, deduction, and luck for 2-4 players based on the new award winning Love Letter game engine, with some new twists!
Reserved for auction winner: user clarkkent22 Buyer paying shipping, Seller paying BGG fee
